name: spo-cleanup-site-column-usage
title: Clean Up Unwanted Site Columns from Content Types and Lists/Libraries
shortDescription: We decide we want to trim away a few of the Site Columns we’ve created, here is the script that does just that
longDescription: Sometimes when we iteratively build out our information architecture, we’re over-zealous. It seems like we need a set of Site Columns to maintain metadata on lists or libraries, but in the end, we decide we want to trim away a few of the Site Columns we’ve created.
